# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I propose a special introductory price of $100 for you today. This offer is exclusive to you and won't be available to others. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at an exceptional value. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer
